StopName: Name that identifies stop; same as other dataset.
StopType: Type of stop, e.g., school, retirement community, daycare, etc.
StopMonth: Month in which the stop was conducted.
StopYear: Year in which the stop was conducted.
StopRoadCondition: Road condition at or on the way to the stop.
StopDuration: Length of time the bookmobile was at the stop.
